1f.text:
Antifa aren't as bad as the radical right. This is a common false equivalency shared by people who are dishonest actors, and also people who are misinformed.

&#x200B;

Right wing extremists have killed dozens,

Antifa milkshaked a few dudes, and (wrongly) punched Andy Ngo.

Read up more on Antifa as they're the ones actively fighting against the extremists such as the one who said this about Ocasio-Cortez

&#x200B;

1j.text: The MMA guys should be quiet. Nothing they do is any more effective in real world scenarios that involve weaponry, firearms, and multiple assailants. They'd still be fucked.

4j.text: The MMA guys should be quiet. Nothing they do is any more effective in real world scenarios that involve weaponry, firearms, and multiple assailants. They'd still be fucked.
4j.parent: MMA fighters all over the world have been nagging traditional martial arts for years. This criticism of their lack of practicality in real world scenarios is legitimate, but I recon that most of the people who practice traditional martial arts do so for their philosophy and "art" aspect.
4j.grandparent: isnt there a growing group of asian MMA fighters who say kung fu is more like yoga than martial arts?
4j.title: Sacred Wonders - BBC (2019) - The extraordinary final test to become a Shaolin Master (Preview)
